text: El Chapulín Colorado (English: The Red Grasshopper) is a Mexican television comedy series. It was created and written by Roberto Gómez Bolaños. It ran from 1973 to 1979. Category:Mexican television series Category:Sitcoms Category:1973 television series debuts Category:1973 establishments in North America Category:1979 disestablishments in North America Category:20th-century disestablishments in Mexico Category:1979 television series endings
title: El Chapulín Colorado
